divs: sighting detailssaw big contrail, so big i got out got my camera and zoomed up to full 12 x all i could see was the trail not the jet as i watched in the finder a luminous ball crossed in front of the jet at twice it's speed. *(link moved to additional evidence section below--cms\sg). see for yourself. have another video over dfw airport to show.
